results.name: a(2n) = a(n), a(2n+1) = 10*a(n) + a(n+1).
comment: Parsed into blocks of 1, 2, 4, 8,...term sums = powers of 12: (1, 12, 144,...).
A178569 is generated from a(2n) = 10*a(n); a(2n+1) = a(n) + a(n+1).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(2n) = a(n), a(2n+1) = 10*a(n) + a(n+1) = row 10 in the array of A178239.

Let M = an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1, 1, 10, 0, 0, 0,...) in each column, shifted down twice from the previous column. This sequence is Lim_{n->inf} M^n, the left-shifted vector considered as a sequence.
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = If[EvenQ@ n, a[n/2], 10 a[(n - 1)/2] + a[(n - 1)/2 + 1]]; Array[a, 55] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 20 2017 *)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, May 29 2010
